description: &7[Inventory Tabs]&r Press &7[&r&6Tab&r&7]&r in the inventory to &dchange workstations&r, or &6Click&r the visual tabs around the screen.

&7[MouseWheelie]&r &6Middle Click&r in any inventory to &dsort items&r. Hold &7[&r&6Space&r&7]&r while clicking an inventory to &drestock from it&r, or while clicking your inventory to &dquick store to it&r.
&7[Inspecio]&r Tooltips contain &ddetailed item information&r, such as item contents, attributes, and effects.
&7[Portable Crafting]&r Press &7[&r&6V&r&7]&r to &dopen your crafting table anywhere&r, if you have one.
&7[EMI]&r Press &7[&r&6R&r&7]&r on an item to see its &drecipes&r, or &7[&r&6U&r&7]&r to see its &dusages&r.
The &3right pane&r shows what you can craft right now. &6Click&r an item to add it to the workstation. &6CTRL+Click&r to craft it instantly.
Press &7[&r&6CTRL+F&r&7]&r to search up items and blocks instead. &6Click&r to see recipes, or &6Right-Click&r to see usages.
